title: Help League won't Stop Crashing!
body: Hello all, recently i got back onto one of my old accounts that i used to play around season 3! I hopped into a bot game to try out this new yorrick rework, got into the game and noticed my resolution was off. So instead of tweaking all the settings i just hit reset to default and for some reason it set my resolution to 4k. My game was very zoomed in and i had to force close it. I tried recconnecting but it would crash immediately and give me a bug splat! I have tried running as admin editing the game.cfg file as well as reinstalling. Im not sure what i can do to fix this I need your guy's help!!! I would be willing to try editing the .cfg file again but im sure i did it right, changed the resolution around to a supported one and saved it? Any help is greatly appreciated while i wait for RITO to respond to my ticket!

replies.body: We don't currently support 4K, and it's very strange that your default settings are acting up and causing you to bugsplat.  I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure that your drivers are updated and that you're clear of any corrupt game files.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically reinstall the client to a fresh state as well!  Hopefully this will get you all fixed up, and welcome back to league!
